author: StevenTheBrick
title: XLarge Basic Bucket
review:
2/5

 

I owned this as a kid. Of course because I was very little, I don't remember building this. This might be my first Lego set also, so it does have a bit of nostalgia. I did have a lot of fun playing with this when I was little. Even though I'm a teen, I give this set a 2 as for its target demographic, it was a good set. Lots of pieces to keep a kid entertained. However, this set won't be as entertaining as the demographic grows.
